conbody.p: Each data collection has a data policy that specifies, among other things, how long data items should be retained in the system. When the item's "time to live" expires, deletes the item from the data store. The data retention behavior, which is set in system configuration, specifies when checks the data store to see what data, if any, is expired and should be deleted from the data store.
You can configure to check on a schedule, or you can manually initiate checking.
